title: What are some examples of songs in the key of D sharp major? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you mean key of E flat. There isn’t a D sharp key, C and C sharp yes - 7 sharps. E flat is sometimes referred to as the “heroic” key, Beethoven’s 3rd sympathy, Wagners Ring Opera Cycle, Mozart Symphony No 39. Also Masonic associations. Loads more. Is Beatles “Across the Universe” ? can’t remember! The first song I worked out by ear was in Eb and its my favourite ever since.

D# is also known as Eb, and a few guitarists tune down a half step to use heavier strings or have a “darker” sound. Stevie Ray Vaughn is an example of the former, and several of his tunes are in that key. Some metal bands are example of the latter. Eb has a relative minor in Cm, which is a much more common key.
